form.name: form1

div.span: Illinois Schools to Remain Closed, per Governor

div.div:
320 W Main St
Ottawa, IL 61350
P: (815) 433-1133

span.div: Please feel free to ask questions that you would like discussed on April 21st, 2020 at the board meeting. Please submit all questions by April 21st by 5 pm. We will compile all of the questions to be discussed during the meeting.

div.strong: To view the live stream of the board meeting on Tuesday, April 21st at 6 pm, click the link below:

p.span:
On Friday, April 17, the governor cancelled in-person instruction for the remainder of the school year. We know there are a lot of questions our families will have about daily lessons and upcoming events that were scheduled. The Board of Education is sensitive to the needs of our families and we will work to give our students the best education we can under the circumstances. We will be addressing the various issues and communicating to our families through our webpages and Facebook page. Please be sure to check our webpage and Facebook frequently for updates
Past announcement Due to the governor's proclamation extending the stay at home order, Ottawa Elementary Schools will be closed through April 30th. Administrators and teachers have been planning for an extended leave. More information will be forthcoming concerning Remote Learning Days and our plan to continue to deliver instruction as the shut down has officially been extended.

span.p: Please see Food Service Information under the PARENTS tab to learn about breakfast and lunch during the mandated school closure.

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff

p.span: to the left then visit Coronavirus to view
Access to information related to the coronavirus is available
on the following link from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
A Fact Sheet from the CDC may be found at this link. https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/downloads/2019-ncov-factsheet.pdf

br.style: font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff

span.p: We are also looking for substitute custodians, teachers, paraprofessionals, bus monitors, bus drivers, lunch servers, and crossing guards. See our Career Opportunities for more information.

span.style: font-family: Times; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;font-size:16px

em.span: Our community is committed to quality education provided by the Ottawa Elementary District for all children in a positive and inviting environment that empowers students to become diverse and global, lifelong learners.

span.div: Upcoming Additional Tuesday Dismissal on Thursday, April 9, 2020.

div.strong: K-6 dismissal is 11:30 a.m, 7-8 dismissal is 12:10 p.m.
